Flower Mills Beauty Toner, Chamomile + Neroli

Brand: Flower Mill Beauty

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Chamomile hydrosol*, neroli hydrosol*, witch hazel, chamomile essential oil*, lavender essential oil*, citric acid, polysorbate 20

Directions: Spritz 2-3 pumps over face and neck after cleansing and before applying moisturizers.

Directions: Spritz 2-3 pumps over face and neck after cleansing and before applying moisturizers.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
